cosmos.question: I twinkle bright up in the night, and help light up the world with my light. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I am round and shiny.
💛 You can see me during the day sometimes, but I am easiest to spot at night.
🌞 I am a very, very big ball of burning gas.

cosmos.question: I am Earth's best friend and orbit it, shining at night, but I have no light of my own. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 I change shape throughout the month.
🚀 Astronauts have walked on me.
🧀 People sometimes say I am made of cheese (but I'm not!).

cosmos.question: I am a hot ball of gas, much smaller than the sun, and I twinkle in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I look small from Earth, but I am very big!
🔭 You need a telescope to see me really well.
🌌 I am part of a galaxy with many others like me.

cosmos.question: I am a place with lots and lots of stars, planets, and dust all swirling around together. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I am very, very big.
🌠 Our solar system is inside of me.
🌌 I have a special name, and it is the Milky Way.

cosmos.question: I am a big, round ball that travels around the sun. Earth is one of me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 I can have moons.
☀️ I get light from the sun.
🪐 I am not a star.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. People use me to tell stories. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some are named after animals.
✨ You can find me in the night sky.
🌌 The Big Dipper is a part of a bigger one.

cosmos.question: I am a very cold and icy ball of rock that flies through space, leaving a bright tail behind. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I get brighter as I get closer to the sun.
❄️ I am mostly made of ice and dust.
💫 My tail always points away from the sun.

cosmos.question: I am a small, rocky object that orbits the Sun, mostly found between Mars and Jupiter. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 I am smaller than a planet.
💥 Sometimes I can hit a planet or moon.
🪐 There are many of me in a 'belt' in our Solar System.

cosmos.question: I am what you call a shooting star, a small piece of space rock burning up as it enters Earth's atmosphere. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I create a streak of light when I fall.
☄️ I am smaller than a comet.
✨ Sometimes, pieces of me can land on Earth.

cosmos.question: I am the force that keeps all the planets orbiting the Sun and keeps you on the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 An apple falling from a tree can help you understand me.
🚀 Without me, you would float away into space!
⚖️ I pull everything towards each other.

transport.question: I have wheels and carry many people, going chug-chug down the street. What am I?

hints.text: 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Many people can ride me.
🛑 I stop at bus stops.
🚌 I am bigger than a car.

transport.question: I float on the water and help people travel across the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I need water to move.
⚓ I might have a big anchor.
🚢 I am bigger than a rowboat.

transport.question: I fly high in the sky and take people to faraway lands. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I fly above the clouds.
✈️ I have wings.
🌎 I can take you to different countries.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you use your feet to move me. What am I?

hints.text: 🤸 You need to balance to ride me.
⚙️ I have pedals.
🚲 I am fun to ride in the park.

transport.question: I zoom on tracks and carry many people across cities. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I need special tracks to travel on.
🚏 I stop at train stations.
🚂 I have many carriages.

transport.question: I am very fast, and I take people to space. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I go to the stars!
👩‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
🌌 I am used for space travel.

transport.question: I have big wheels and carry lots of heavy things. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I deliver goods.
🚧 You often see me on the highway.
🚚 I am bigger than a car and carry cargo.

transport.question: I can fly up and down, and I have a spinning blade on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I don't need a runway to take off.
🚨 You might see me helping people in trouble.
🌪️ I have a big propeller on top.

transport.question: I travel under the ground in tunnels. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 I use electric power.
🔦 It's dark where I go.
🏙️ I am often used in big cities.

transport.question: I sail the seas and can carry many cars and people. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I can transport vehicles.
🚢 I am a type of large ship.
🌊 I help people travel across big waters.
